mapper.insert: insert into go_treat( GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_HOSPITAL_ID, GO_CITIZEN_ID, GO_DOCTOR_ID, GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE, GO_CHART_CODE, GO_CHART_SEQ, GO_TREAT_CONTENTS, GO_TREAT_REGISTRATION_DATE, GO_TREAT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},#{goTreatCode}), #{goHospitalId}, #{goCitizenId}, #{goDoctorId}, #{goTreatSubjectCode}, #{goChartCode}, #{goChartSeq}, #{goTreatContents}, #{goTreatRegistrationDate}, #{goTreatGoRegistrationDate} )
